item.title: Casper Smart Accused of Cheating on Jennifer Lopez, Being an Idiot
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: 3 minutesIt appears as if Casper Smart is smart in name only. Because a new report claims that the dancer recently took …

Casper Smart Accused of Cheating on Jennifer Lopez, Being an Idiot was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 3 minutes

It appears as if Casper Smart is smart in name only.

Because a new report claims that the dancer recently took certain actions that can only be described as dumb.

Like, really, really, really, REALLY dumb.

Like, so dumb that we have to assume Smart is voting for Donald Trump on November 8.

This is what has us talking in such a manner:

Earlier this year, Lopez and Smart got back together … only to break up in August.

The artist and the choreographer first got together way back in October of 2011 and were very serious for a couple years, but then then split and didn’t even make a big deal about reconciling this year.

The cause of their latest breakup was also left unknown at the time it went down.

But now People Magazine claims to have the scoop. 

“She kicked him out because he cheated on her and he got caught,” an insider tells the magazine, adding:

“It happened two years ago, and he promised he would never do it again and once he did, she was done.”

Wait, let us get this straight:

Smart cheated on Jennifer Lopez TWICE?

First, back in the day, which prompted their initial breakup?

And then again this summer, which caused Lopez to dump his lying rear end for good?

Over the past few weeks, the source says Smart has "been doing everything he can to get back together, working on himself and posting on his Instagram saying that ‘Life is Good’ and showing off his new leg tattoo that says ‘You must embrace the darkness to see the light.’"

It’s true. Smart does now have a leg tattoo that says this…

… although we’re not sure how that’s going to help him win Jennifer Lopez back over.

People does go on to write that Smart’s plan to reconcile is based on more than just empty words and cliches.

“He says he’s changed and that he is a new man but recently, on a video shoot for Wisin in Mexico, he was posting videos with bikini-clad dancers and not acting like a guy trying to remedy old habits," the source says.

"He was kicked to the curb not because he did not attend a party with J. Lo but because he was caught having parties of his own. No one has time for that, especially J. Lo.” 

Heck no!

This is J. Lo!

She has music videos to shoot and NBC dramas to film famous old flames to possibly rekindle!

She doesn’t have time for some cheating backup dancer. Please, child.

24 Stars Who Have Been Cheated On

VIEW GALLERY

When news broke of the Lopez and Smart split went viral August, a different source claimed it was an amicable separation, saying at the time:

“It wasn’t anything dramatic and they were on good terms – it just came to a natural end.

"They will remain friends and they see each other, but they are not together. It was very amiable."

But it sounds like that person had his or her information wrong.

Because if this new report is accurate… and if Lopez caught Smart cheating on her for a second time… we somehow doubt there was anything amicable about that.

At. All.

Casper Smart Accused of Cheating on Jennifer Lopez, Being an Idiot was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Casper Smart Sends Jennifer Lopez Flowers…With Jennifer Lopez’s Money
item.dc:creator: Kelly Lynch
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesThere are certain ways to win back the woman you love. Sending a bouquet of flowers with a bill attached …

Casper Smart Sends Jennifer Lopez Flowers…With Jennifer Lopez’s Money was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

There are certain ways to win back the woman you love.

Sending a bouquet of flowers with a bill attached is not one of them.

Apparently this is what Casper Smart did after his relationship with Jennifer Lopez ended.

According to Life & Style, Smart dialed up Lopez’s favorite Los Angeles-area florist “and placed a custom order for $525” for two dozen pink roses.

At first, you want to give the guy a break and assume he accidentally charged on the wrong account.

It turns out, however, that Smart had meant to bill his ex, because “several hours later, J. Lo’s manager called Casper and yelled at him because he had charged the flowers to J. Lo’s personal account.”

Lopez, 47, and her 29-year-old boyfriend split up in late August, a source told People Magazine.  They had been dating on and off for five years.

“Jennifer and Casper have split,” the source said.

“They have not been together for a few weeks.”

Nothing big caused the break-up, save for the obvious age difference.

“It wasn’t anything dramatic and they were on good terms – it just came to a natural end,” the source insisted.

“They will remain friends and they see each other, but they are not together. It was very amiable.”

Of course, this is too dull a story for the gossip rags, who immediately started digging for some dirt on the former couple.

In Touch beat everyone to it, claiming that Smart would not move out of Lopez’s home, despite being cut off financially.  The horror!

“He was refusing to move out of Jennifer’s house and even threatened legal action if Jennifer attempts to have the locks changed,” a source claimed.

“He won’t accept that the relationship is over.” 

Or his cash flow.

“She cut off all of his credit cards and access to a bank account she’d established for him,” the source added.

“She was very generous to Casper. Dating her has a lot of perks — private-jet travel, over-the-top vacations, attending only the best parties — so Jennifer questions whether he’s in love with her or her lifestyle.”

50/50?  May 40/60…commercial air travel is a real bitch these days, so it’s always nice to have that PJ gassed up and ready to fly.

Casper Smart Sends Jennifer Lopez Flowers…With Jennifer Lopez’s Money was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: 13 Celebrity Text Messaging Scandals: Unsend! Unsend!
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: < 1 minuteWe all know that text messages can sometimes be hilarious. Like when they’re sent by mom. Or if the the …

13 Celebrity Text Messaging Scandals: Unsend! Unsend! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

We all know that text messages can sometimes be hilarious. Like when they’re sent by mom.

Or if the the characters on Game of Thrones ever learned how to text.

But sometimes it’s best to just put your phone away and think twice – nay, three times! – before picking it back up and hitting Send.

Like when you’re slamming a famous ex-girlfriend and her untalented lady parts. Or when you’re a married professional golfer and you wanna bang a porn star. Or when your name is Anthony Weiner.

Below, THG presents 13 of the most well-known celebrity text message scandals of all-time, with far too many involving penis photos and one too many involving a bloodied, beaten Rihanna:

13 Celebrity Text Messaging Scandals

VIEW GALLERY

13 Celebrity Text Messaging Scandals: Unsend! Unsend! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Casper Smart Denies Cheating on J. Lo, May Sue The Dirty Over Transsexual Rumors
item.dc:creator: Free Britney
item.description:
Reading Time: < 1 minuteCasper Smart is adamant that he didn’t cheat on Jennifer Lopez with two transsexual models, and is gearing up to …

Casper Smart Denies Cheating on J. Lo, May Sue The Dirty Over Transsexual Rumors was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Casper Smart is adamant that he didn’t cheat on Jennifer Lopez with two transsexual models, and is gearing up to sue the gossip site that reported this.

Jennifer Lopez and her boyfriend split up a few months back, and it had nothing to do with Smart’s alleged sexting shenanigans, as reported by The Dirty.

Casper is downright pissed that The Dirty claimed he cheated with Sofie Vissa and another transsexual he met on Instagram, and is ready to take action.

His lawyer fired off a letter to the site’s founder, Nik Richie, denying he’s ever met, kissed or had sex with either of the two transsexuals in question.

The attorney says the dancer didn’t send them any sexy photos and flat out denies Casper Smart cheated on Jennifer, demanding a retraction or else.

Smart’s lawyer also sent a threatening letter to Vissa, one of the transsexual models, imploring her to sign a declaration saying they never met Smart.

 

Sofie has been talking to the media, which Smart doesn’t care for. As for Richie, he doesn’t seem concerned, or eager to retract The Dirty’s story.

When you get sued as often as he does, you likely grow immune.

Nik tells TMZ: “Casper, go get a real job. I heard Instagram is hiring over in their compliance department … Stop blaming everyone else for your problems.”

Your move, Casper. In the meantime … sorry about this, man:

Casper Smart Denies Cheating on J. Lo, May Sue The Dirty Over Transsexual Rumors was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Casper Smart Denies Affair with Transgender Model, May File Lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: < 1 minuteCasper Smart has spoken out for the first time since splitting from Jennifer Lopez. The backup dancer and the American …

Casper Smart Denies Affair with Transgender Model, May File Lawsuit was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Casper Smart has spoken out for the first time since splitting from Jennifer Lopez.

The backup dancer and the American Idol judge called it quits late last week, with some sources saying the two remain on good terms… but another source saying the scandalous opposite.

Over the weekend, a transgender model named Xristina Marie alleged that she hooked up with Smart weeks before his relationship with Lopez ended.

This claim follows a similar one made by another transgender model, Sofie Vissa, who said earlier this month that she exchanged racy pics and texts with the choreographer.

And Smart has finally had enough.

 

"There is no truth to any meeting or physical encounter," he tells Us Weekly of Marie’s assertion, adding of possible legal action in retaliation:

"I am weighing my options on the appropriate action to take against Xristina Marie and/or The Sun."

Rumors of Casper Smart cheating on J. Lo have been rampant for weeks, but an insider tells Us Weekly that no "scandal" played any role in this break-up.

"It has actually been an amicable process that started a few months ago. It wasn’t an easy decision," the source said. "But they decided to stay friends."

With benefits? Smart should be so lucky.

Celebrity Break-Ups of 2014

VIEW GALLERY

Casper Smart Denies Affair with Transgender Model, May File Lawsuit was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
